[30;1m25 | [0m[35m    This node classifies documents and adds the output from the classification step to the document'[0m
[30;1m26 | [0m[35m    The meta field of the document is a dictionary with the following format:[0m

[30;1m191 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m24 | [0m[35mclass CohereRanker(BaseRanker):[0m
[30;1m25 | [0m[35m    """[0m
[30;1m26 | [0m[35m    You can use re-ranking on top of a Retriever to boost the performance for document search.[0m
[30;1m27 | [0m[35m    This is particularly useful if the Retriever has a high recall but is bad in sorting the documen[0m
[30;1m28 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m29 | [0m[35m    Cohere models are trained with a context length of 512 tokens - the model takes into account bot[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m1617[0m[34m of [0m[33m2109[0m[31m ]--[0m
   Rule Id: [34mBD000610[0m
